item.title: Equivalence of Linear State-Space and Autoregressive Models
item.description: Linear state-space models can be converted to linear autoregressive models and vice versa. This note derives these equivalence. The line of work around the S4 paper, the Hyena Heirarchy, any other related papers, has brought to attention (to the ML world) the equivalence of (linear) state-space and convolution models. There’s also an equivalence to autoregressive models. The derivation is a bit more opaque; many texts rely on the Z-transform, but the derivation can understood via shift operators instead.
